lead_paragraph: Terrorists stormed a major hospital in Lahore, firing indiscriminately, then managed to escape.
snippet: Terrorists stormed a major hospital in Lahore, firing indiscriminately, then managed to escape.

headline.main: Four Dead in Attack on Hospital in Pakistan
headline.print_headline: Gunmen Storm a Hospital In Pakistan, Killing at Least 6

byline.original: By WAQAR GILLANI  and ADAM B. ELLICK
byline.contributor: Waqar Gillani reported from Lahore, and Adam B. Ellick from Islamabad, Pakistan.
